bangaladeshaya ‚Äì kadulu 9k dawi lakunu 176 (panduwara 20): shakib al hasan 38, imrul kayis 36, saumya sarkar 34, sabbir rahman 19, musaddik husen 17, lasith malinga 3/34, asela gunarathna 1/15, thisara perera 1/24, nuwan kulasekara 1/30.

me kuriru thrasthawadaya awasan kirimata saha nirayuda, awihinsaka janathawage jiwitha ha depala araksha karanna wishala mudal pramanayak ape rajayata awashya wuna. 2003 wasaredi rajya aarakshaka wiyadama rupiyal koti 4700 yi. 2009 di prabhakaran iwara karala rata thrasthawadayen muda ganna koti 25,000 k waya karanna apata siduwuna.
